titleInfo.title: Western provinces: British Columbia - Alberta - Saskatchewan - Manitoba [with or without part of Ontario] [Oil Company road maps]

mods.note: Esso maps: 1935; 1939; 1940; 1941. (Years 1935-1941 cover: Canada and the northern United States. Vancouver & vicinity.)

Companies other than Esso: 1950 Rolph-Clark-Stone for Texaco; 1952 Gousha for Shell; 1953 Gousha for B/A; 1961 Rolph-Clark-Stone for Texaco;1961 Rolph-Clark-Stone for B/A; 1962 Gousha for Phillips 66; 1963 Rolph-Clark-Stone for Texaco; 1963 Gousha for Purity; 1968 Gousha for Chevron; 1969 Gousha for Texaco; 1968 Rolph-Clark-Stone for Shell; 1973 Rolph-Clark-Stone for Mobil
